title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - LSEG: Modernizing critical financial systems with multicloud and hybrid cloud
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - LSEG：通过多云和混合云实现关键金融系统现代化
abstract: Join this session to learn how London Stock Exchange Group (LSEG) is modernizing critical financial infrastructure through multicloud and hybrid cloud adoption. LSEG manages regulated environments across major cloud providers with unified governance, addressing regulatory requirements while maintaining operational efficiency. Using AWS hybrid cloud technology, LSEG is transforming its global PriceStream FX trading platform, implementing a sophisticated architecture for ultra-low latency with managed services. Additionally, LSEG is modernizing clearing systems as critical national infrastructure, balancing regulatory compliance, operational excellence, and business continuity with strict RPO/RTO requirements. Discover how LSEG's journey enables exceptional performance while meeting stringent resiliency and regulatory standards.
abstract_cn: 加入本次会议，了解伦敦证券交易所集团（LSEG）如何通过多云和混合云采用来实现关键金融基础设施的现代化。LSEG通过统一治理管理跨主要云提供商的受监管环境，在保持运营效率的同时满足监管要求。利用AWS混合云技术，LSEG正在转型其全球PriceStream外汇交易平台，通过托管服务实施超低延迟的复杂架构。此外，LSEG正在对作为关键国家基础设施的清算系统进行现代化改造，在严格的RPO/RTO要求下平衡监管合规性、运营卓越性和业务连续性。了解LSEG的转型之旅如何在满足严格的弹性和监管标准的同时实现卓越性能。
